title: 'Nice watch'
body: 'It monitors my activity all day whether it is sleeping running playing and even sedantary breaks etc. Its SpO2 and heart rate measuring feature is the best use for me as I need to keep my body in control. It gives 99% accuracy in measurements.'

title: 'Poor step tracker'
body: 'The step tracker is of very poor quality...responds to even a flick of the wrist ...very disappointed. The customer assistance has not responded to any of my requests'

title: 'Suitable for daily activity!'
body: 'It monitors my activity all day whether it is sleeping running playing and even sedantary breaks etc. Its SpO2 and heart rate measuring feature is the best use for me as I need to keep my body in control. It gives 99% accuracy in measurements. In addition of all of these the watch sync my data with the application and the app store my current and previous data. This help me when I go to doctor for routine health checkups.'

title: 'Not recommended'
body: 'Not double tap work Call notification not show Steps count without walk Display qaulity low not as per price and as per show in product description'

title: 'Wrong Tracking'
body: The steps tracking is not correct. It counts even if I ride bike. Not sure whether other sensors are correct as well. 2 starts for great design and feel. If you want proper activity tracker don't go for this.

title: 'Look is good'

title: 'Best one'
body: The media could not be loaded. This smart watch is so good. Quality of belt is very nice. It looks very classic. It is water proof. It's visibility is so good. We can easily use it outside in sun light. It is light weight and lots of features are available in it. We can measure our heartbeats, stress level. Call through it. Talk on it. Its voice clearity is perfect. We can also Check notifications, play and stop songs. Connectivity speed is nice. Battery backup is good. It last upto 5-6 days. It is easy to handle. I brought it to gift my father and he loves it. At this price range this watch is so good.

title: 'boAt Newly Launched Lunar Vista Smart Watch'
body: Very Attractive Product with all functions including Bluetooth calling. Dialpad is big & very easy to use and charge. With the use of 4-5 days i am writing this review. It's an amazing product, It's round shape dial is very best in design. And it's all features are amazing. Multiple sports and sleep tracker helps me to activate my body schedule very good. It's fast charging make the use of watch very quite easily. And band is also so much comfortable with the skin. Overall a best product. And i recommend to go for it.
